title: Salesforce CRM Integration Platform
description: A comprehensive integration platform connecting Salesforce with multiple external systems including ERP, marketing automation, and customer support tools.
longDescription: Developed a robust integration platform that synchronizes data between Salesforce and various enterprise systems. Implemented real-time data sync, error handling, and monitoring dashboards.

title: Lightning Web Component Library
description: A reusable component library built with Lightning Web Components for common UI patterns in Salesforce applications.
longDescription: Created a comprehensive library of reusable Lightning Web Components following Salesforce design system guidelines. Components include data tables, forms, modals, and navigation elements.

title: Apex Testing Framework
description: A comprehensive testing framework for Apex classes with utilities for data creation, mocking, and assertion helpers.
longDescription: Built a testing framework that simplifies unit testing in Salesforce. Includes utilities for creating test data, mocking external calls, and providing assertion helpers for common scenarios.

title: Salesforce Mobile App
description: A mobile application built with Salesforce Mobile SDK for field service technicians.
longDescription: Developed a mobile app using Salesforce Mobile SDK that allows field service technicians to access customer information, update work orders, and capture photos on-site.

title: Data Migration Tool
description: A custom tool for migrating data from legacy systems to Salesforce with validation and error reporting.
longDescription: Created a data migration tool that handles complex data transformations, validates data integrity, and provides detailed error reports for troubleshooting migration issues.

title: Salesforce Analytics Dashboard
description: Custom analytics dashboard with advanced reporting and visualization capabilities.
longDescription: Built a custom analytics dashboard using Lightning components and Apex that provides advanced reporting capabilities beyond standard Salesforce reports and dashboards.
